amendment.description: Amendment strikes Section 510, which currently prohibits HHS from spending any federal dollars to promulgate or adopt a national patient identifier.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to strike Section 510, which currently prohibits HHS from spending any federal dollars to promulgate or adopt a national patient identifier.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 178 (Roll no. 270).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 178 (Roll no. 270).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Foster.
